credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Band
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: deflected element work using cross and over-casting stitches
description: Band with a design of an angular curving vine bearing fruit and leaves. Pattern in reserve on a background in red silk. Fragment from a larger pieces. Upper edge finished with different color silk.
name: Band
